message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.DC 

This paper discusses the security and trust issues in the Certificate Authority (CA) ecosystem, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the systemic problems and misaligned incentives between players in the ecosystem, which can be categorized under software engineering (cs.SE) and cybernetics (cs.CY). The proposed insurance-based mechanism for authentication can be categorized under social and information networks (cs.SI) and distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
